bio:
Kottir Red-Shoal is a Stormcloak captain and the commander of the Reach Stormcloak Camp.
If the Dragonborn chooses to side with the Stormcloaks during the Civil War and takes The Reach for them, Kottir will be found in Understone Keep in Markarth. He appears during one of the quests in the Civil War questline.
name: Kottir Red-Shoal
